remove_divergent	A2,A1
remove_insertions	131,132,261,13,20,21,22,23,185,186,187,188,189,190,61,192,193,194,195,62,191,196,197,72,198,199,200,201,202,203,204,205,206,207,208,210,90,91,220,221,222,98,99,100,101,102,103,104,105,106,107,108,109,229,230,231,232,233,234,235,236,237,238,239
